channel.title: How do I move where an object is?
channel.description:
I wanna move a table and 3 range targets... Don't know how though.=\
Any know how???[br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2007, 11:18:58 PM[/size][hr]Come one........ anyone??!?!

item.title: How do I move where an object is?
item.dc:creator: @hosphin hosphin
item.description:
@hosphin wrote:

u need this

[code]public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) {

ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10);
}[/code]

and this

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType); } } } } }

add this

public void NewObjects() {

deletethatobject(coordinatesX, coordinatesY);// the cordinates of what u would delete from the map
makeGlobalObject(coordinatesX, coordinatesY, ObjectID, 0, 10);//the iten u would add into map

}

look for case 121 it should looks like this

case 121: // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // println_debug("Loading finished."); break;

change to this

case 121:NewObjects(); // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // println_debug("Loading finished."); break;

done…
